description: From a series of four etchings for the story "Der Rebell" by Manfred Georg, Heinrich Hochstim-Verlag, Berlin, 1918; close-up of a man's head with large expressive eyes staring straight ahead; there is a black dot between his brows with a black trail of ink running down the side of this nose and cheek
inscription: LL in pencil, below image: Probedruck 1. | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: E.119-I. | LRC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2283
portfolio: From Plate 1 from Der Rebell (The Rebel), Manfred Georg, Heinrich Hochstim-Verlag, Berlin, 1918
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18.
title: Peter's Head with the Gunshot Wound in the Forehead, Plate 1 from Der Rebell (The Rebel)
